Guatemala next week

Nov 16, 2007


I am going to Guatemala tomorrow. I’ll be back in NYC on the 26th. My friend Tim of Cafe Conciencia hired a design collective, The Change, to redesign the coffee packaging of the four communities they work with, as well as redo the webpage. I’ll be taking portraits of the farmers for the next week for the new design. Yay, Guatemala!
